descriptionlist.description:
This package depends Alderis package from Chariz: https://chariz.com/

Add pasteboard shortcuts to your keyboard dock!

Supporting notched devices (X, XS, XR, 11) running iOS 12-13. Mostly works with iPhone X UI enabling tweak. If your own an iPad, check out XPad.

Available shortcuts:
-Select All
-Copy
-Paste
-Cut
-Undo
-Redo
-Beginning of Document
-Ending of Document
-Capitalize
-Lowercase
-Uppercase
-Delete
-Bold
-Italic
-Underline
-Cursor Left
-Cursor Right
-Dismiss Keyboard
and many more long press gesture on the shortcuts

Go to setting page to manage your shortcuts.

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
